headline: Van Houtte Coffee Services Expands in Edmonton with New Office and Distribution Centre, Affirming Commitment to Long-Term Growth in Western Canada
summary: Van Houtte Coffee Services (VHCS), Canada's leading commercial coffee services provider and a division of Keurig Dr Pepper Canada, is proud to announce the official opening of its new $1.5 million, 26,000-square-foot office and distribution centre in Edmonton. This expansion builds on VHCS's 40+ years of presence in the region, underscoring the company's ongoing commitment to innovation, customer service, and strengthening its footprint across Western Canada.

This expansion builds on VHCS's 40+ years of presence in the region, underscoring the company's ongoing commitment to innovation, customer service, and strengthening its footprint across Western Canada.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper allowed to end partnership with Reyes Coca-Cola, judge rules
summary: A Reyes Coca-Cola Bottling spokesperson said the group was "carefully evaluating all of our options, including the possibility of an appeal".

raw.headline: Keurig Dr Pepper allowed to end partnership with Reyes Coca-Cola, judge rules
raw.summary: A Reyes Coca-Cola Bottling spokesperson said the group was "carefully evaluating all of our options, including the possibility of an appeal".

headline: Vernors Debuts Nostalgia-evoking LTO Celebrating Michigan's Beloved Boston Cooler
summary: This summer, Vernors is bringing a refreshing taste of Michigan nostalgia to fans across the state with the release of its latest limited-edition offering, the Vernors Boston Cooler.

raw.headline: Vernors Debuts Nostalgia-evoking LTO Celebrating Michigan's Beloved Boston Cooler
raw.summary: This summer, Vernors is bringing a refreshing taste of Michigan nostalgia to fans across the state with the release of its latest limited-edition offering, the Vernors Boston Cooler.
